name: Crasher
description:
Enjoy the game and escape from the boredom of your everyday life. You feel cool and enjoyable which can not be felt from your daily routine.
You do not have to earn a high score or follow the game rule.
Just make time for the game and destroy objects to be seen by throwing a thing whenever the fancy takes you.
It helps you to get rid of stress by throwing things and destroying them.
FEATURES
- 4 Game Level
- Physics based gameplay (Box2d)
- Mini Games in game
- Various Achievements
- GameCenter achievements and scoring
- Facebook, Twitter
 MORE GAMES
- iChallenger
- Dinosaur Slayer
- Zombie Sweeper
*Update 1.1 *
-added sound on/off
-added Bonus TIme!
-added Gun
